BasicInfo.short: Cloud Lending, Inc. is a company that develops software for the financial lending industry.

Products.name: CL Marketplace
Products.description: CL Marketplace is a marketplace solution built natively on Salesforce that simplifies and automates the entire loan process for marketplace.

Products.name: CL Originate
Products.description: CL Originate is a next generation cloud-based platform for loan origination built natively on Salesforce.com

Products.name: CL Lease
Products.description: CL Lease is a lease servicing platform built natively on Salesforce that efficiently manages equipment leases throughout the lifecycle.
